text: Thomas "Tommy" Lowrie (14 January 1928 – 24 April 2009) was a Scottish footballer. Lowrie played for Troon Athletic as a youth, before joining English club Manchester United in 1947. He later played for Aberdeen, Oldham Athletic, Stranraer and Berwick Rangers before retiring in 1956. He went on to coach at East Kilbride Thistle.
